section.heading: Authorization for grant-managing entity.
section.text: For Fiscal Year 2017, the Department of Health is designated as the grant-managing entity.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 5052 of the Fiscal Year 2016 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2015 (D.C. Act 21-127, July 27, 2015, 62 DCR 10201).
The 2015 amendment by D.C. Law 21-36 substituted “For Fiscal Year 2016” for “For Fiscal Year 2015.”
